item.title: The Mercenary
item.description: The Mercenary, known in the UK as A Professional Gun, is a 1968 Zapata Western film directed by Sergio Corbucci. The film stars Franco Nero, Jack Palance, Tony Musante, Eduardo Fajardo and Giovanna Ralli, and features a musical score by Ennio Morricone and Bruno Nicolai.

item.title: All'ombra di una colt
item.description: In a Colt's Shadow is a 1965 Italian spaghetti western film directed and written by Giovanni Grimaldi.

item.title: Minnesota Clay
item.description: Minnesota Clay is a 1964 Italian/French/Spanish international co-production spaghetti western directed by Sergio Corbucci.

item.title: Sonny and Jed
item.description: Sonny and Jed is a 1972 Italian Spaghetti Western film about a sheriff's relentless effort to stop a robber and his girlfriend. The film was directed by Sergio Corbucci and is noted for its music, scored by Ennio Morricone.

item.title: Ballad of a Bounty Hunter
item.description: Ballad of a Bounty Hunter is a 1968 Spanish western film directed by Joaquín Luis Romero Marchent and distributed by Troma Entertainment.

item.title: Compañeros
item.description: Compañeros is a 1970 Zapata Western film directed by Sergio Corbucci. The film stars Franco Nero, Tomas Milian, Jack Palance and Fernando Rey. The soundtrack for the film was written by Ennio Morricone, and the orchestra was conducted by Bruno Nicolai.

item.title: The Hellbenders
item.description: The Hellbenders is a 1967 Spaghetti Western directed by Sergio Corbucci.

item.title: Navajo Joe
item.description: Navajo Joe is a 1966 Spaghetti Western film, directed by Sergio Corbucci, and stars Burt Reynolds as the titular Navajo Indian who opposes a group of bandits responsible for killing his tribe.
